details: Development of eMedipro using Angular, .NET, and SQL Server. Created intuitive user interfaces and integrated them with backend APIs. Full package including modules like Billing, Account, Pharmacy, Inventory, Lab, etc. Versioning with Bitbucket. Role encompassed frontend development, API integration, database involvement, and user interaction.

slogan: Custom Software for Unbiased Data Collection
details: Developed a custom software for Tilganga Hospital's research project. Utilized SQL Server and .NET for the software, which consisted of multiple forms and logic to collect data from various districts of Nepal.

project_name: Analysis of Rabin Karp and Knuth Morris Pratt Algorithm for Plagiarism Detection
details: Undertook the project in a group of three, built using Next.js. Employed Rabin Karp and Knuth Morris Pratt algorithms with a user-provided threshold value to calculate plagiarism degree. Used Potter stemming algorithm for text processing. System involved web scraping data from Google using Axios to generate a source file compared against user-provided text file.

slogan: Website Development for Namsaling High School
details: Coded websites using HTML, CSS, Laravel, and PHP. Conducted robust backend and frontend development using Laravel during the tenure at Namsaling High School.

This is a chat application where users can chat with strangers without revealing their identity. The application is built using Node.js and socket.io . The application has features like dummy name, topic of interest etc.

This is a dynamic ecommerce website where users can buy products. The application is built using PHP . The application allows admin to add product to various categories.The user can login and add products to cart and checkout. The application has features like search, filter, checkout etc.
